subject: RE: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: Why do you hate Javadocs, out of curiosity? I think they re a great tool for easy documentation. -tim ... From: Eric Heikkila [mailto:ericheikkila@yahoo.com]
messageBody:
Why do you hate Javadocs, out of curiosity? I think they're a great
tool for easy documentation.

-tim

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Heikkila [mailto:ericheikkila@...]
Sent: Monday, February 18, 2002 10:37 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [junit] Re: JavaDocs


JAVADOCS!!!????

AHHH!!...RUN AWAY!!!!!

--- "STRAYER, JON (AIT)" <jon.strayer@...> wrote:
> The javadoc task doesn't support the nested
> "fileset" element. At least not
> the one that I have.
>

NESTING!!?? IN JAVADOCS?? RUN AWAY FARTHER!! ;)

hehe..needless to say, I really can't stand java docs.
What is it you're trying to document? Do you REALLY
need to use these, or is there a better way?

BTW - Just posing the question...don't have any
answers right now. Really just wanted to see what
other people thought about it.

-Eric
